messages.content:
I'll help you understand this codebase. Let me start by exploring the structure and key files.
## AI Clone Video Generator
This is an **AI-powered video generation web application** that creates talking head videos with lip-sync. Here's what it does:
### ğŸ¯ Core Purpose
Generate realistic AI talking head videos by:
1. Writing/uploading scripts
2. Creating custom avatar scenes with AI
3. Generating voiceovers using voice clones (ElevenLabs)
4. Producing lip-synced videos (Kie.ai)
### ğŸ—ï¸ Architecture
**Frontend** (React + Vite):
- React 18 with Vite for fast development
- TailwindCSS for styling
- Zustand for state management
- IndexedDB for local storage (all data stays in browser)
- Libraries: axios, react-dropzone, react-hot-toast, react-router-dom
**Backend** (Express):
- Node.js/Express API server
- Acts as a proxy for external APIs
- Multer for file uploads
- Mock mode for development without API keys
### ğŸ”Œ External APIs
- **Kie.ai**: Scene generation and video lip-sync
- **ElevenLabs**: Voice cloning and text-to-speech
### ğŸ“ Key Structure
```
â”œâ”€â”€ backend/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ routes/          # API endpoints
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ utils/           # API clients & mock data
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ server.js        # Express server
â”œâ”€â”€ frontend/src/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/      # React UI components
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ stores/          # Zustand state management
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/           # Database & API utilities
â””â”€â”€ docs/                # User & developer guides
```
### ğŸ”‘ Key Features
- 4-step workflow: Script â†’ Scene â†’ Voiceover â†’ Video
- Local-first (no server storage)
- Project management (save/resume)
- Mock mode for development
- Privacy-focused (all data in browser)
This is essentially a **no-code video creation tool** that lets users create professional AI talking head videos without video editing skills.
